title: AirflowPipeline
description: Airflow Pipeline is used to setup a DAG and deploy. This entity is used to setup metadata/quality pipelines on Apache Airflow.

pipelineStatus.description: This defines the runtime status of Pipeline.

state.description: Pipeline status denotes if its failed or succeeded.

startDate.description: startDate of the Pipeline run for this particular execution.

endDate.description: endDate of the pipeline run for this particular execution.

name.description: Name that identifies this task instance uniquely.

operator.description: Python classname of the operator used in this Task.

dependencies.description: All the tasks that are downstream of this task.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this pipeline.

name.description: Name that identifies this pipeline instance uniquely.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Pipeline.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Name that uniquely identifies a Pipeline.

forceDeploy.description: Deploy the pipeline by overwriting existing pipeline with the same name.

pausePipeline.description: pause the pipeline from running once the deploy is finished successfully.

nextExecutionDate.description: Next execution date from the underlying pipeline platform once the pipeline scheduled.

pipelineTimezone.description: Timezone in which pipeline going to be scheduled.

retries.description: Retry pipeline in case of failure.

pipelineCatchup.description: Run past executions if the start date is in the past.

scheduleInterval.description: Scheduler Interval for the pipeline in cron format.

pipelineTimeout.description: Timeout for the pipeline in seconds.

pipelineStatuses.description: List of executions and status for the Pipeline.

workflowTimeout.description: Timeout for the workflow in seconds.

pythonOperatorLocation.description: File system directory path where managed python operator files are stored.

slaMissCallback.description: python method call back on SLA miss.

onSuccessCallback.description: callback method on successful execution of the pipeline.

onFailureCallback.description: callback method on pipeline execution failure.

onSuccessCallbackName.description: python method name to call when the pipeline successfully executes.

onSuccessCallbackFile.description: python file where the successful callback method is stored.

onFailureCallbackName.description: python method name to call when the pipeline failed executes.

onFailureCallbackFile.description: python file where the failure callback method is stored

tasks.description: All the tasks that are part of pipeline.

service.description: Link to the database service where this database is hosted in.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

changeDescription.description: Change that led to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
